articles.description: Motorola India is all set to launch the Moto Edge 30 smartphone on May 12, 2022. According to the tipster, Moto Edge 30 will retail at Rs 27,999 for the 8GB RAM and either 128GB or 256GB internal storage.
articles.content: Motorola India is all set to launch the Moto Edge 30 smartphone on May 12, 2022. The company has been teasing the device on its official Twitter account. The smartphone is claimed to be the world's t… [+1784 chars]

articles.title: I tried the Nothing Launcher and here’s my first impression - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Nothing Launcher offers a first look at the upcoming NothingOS that will run on the upcoming Nothing phone, but is it any good? Read on to know more.
